sentence.Network_en: The object has no real value, materially or emotionally.
sentence.Network_cn: 无论从物质还是情感上说，这个东西都一无是处。

sentence.Network_en: They believe that a tough, materially poor childhood is character-building.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们认为一个艰难贫困的童年有助于性格的培养。

sentence.Network_en: He has tried to help this child materially and spiritually.
sentence.Network_cn: 他尽力在物质和精神上帮助这个孩子。

list.abs: M开头的英语四级词汇_百度文库 ... material n. 材料；素材a.物质的 materialism n. 唯物主义 mathematical a. 数学的，数学上的.
...；对于没有信息电子化的公司，也要把这些数据统计得清清楚楚，一个账目混乱的企业是不会有好的经济效益的。, 3.材料(material), 第二个M就是材料(material)采购部要对每一种原材料都应严格按照公司质检部门规定的质量标准把好.
高一英语单词表 - 豆丁网 ... soda n 苏打；碳酸水 material n 材料；原料 poster n 海报；招贴.

entry.def: A material is a solid substance.

example.ex: ...electrons in a conducting material such as a metal.
example.tran: 金属等导电材料中的电子
新型高吸水性材料的设计

example.ex: The materials are soft and comfortable to wear.
example.tran: 这些布料质地柔软，穿着很舒服。

entry.def: Materials are the things that you need for a particular activity.

example.ex: The builders ran out of materials.

entry.def: Ideas or information that are used as a basis for a book, play, or film can be referred  to as material .

example.ex: In my version of the story, I added some new material.
example.tran: 我在讲述这个故事时加入了新的素材。

example.ex: ...the film producer's debt to the author of original screen material.
example.tran: 影片的制片人受到了创作影片原始素材的作者的启发

entry.tran: （指与抽象相对）物质的，有形的，实体的
entry.def: Material things are related to possessions or money, rather than to more abstract things such as ideas or values.

example.ex: Every room must have been stuffed with material things.
example.tran: 每个房间肯定都塞满了东西。

entry.def: If you say that someone is a particular kind of material, you mean that they have the qualities or abilities to do a particular job or task.

example.ex: His message has changed little since he became presidential material.
example.tran: 成为总统候选人后，他的宣言并没有多少变化。

entry.tran: (证据或信息)直接相关的，实质性的，重要的
entry.def: Material evidence or information is directly relevant and important in a legal or academic argument.

example.ex: The nature and availability of material evidence was not to be discussed...
example.tran: 实质性证据的性质和可用性毋庸讨论。

example.ex: They contend that the company failed to disclose material information.
example.tran: 他们坚持认为该公司并未透露实质性的信息。

sentences.sentence: "it aided him materially in winning the argument"

auth_sentence.content: It is seriously doubtful that technology will materially change this.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is seriously doubtful that technology will materially change this.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is seriously doubtful that technology will materially change this.

auth_sentence.content: What is formally correct may be materially false.
auth_sentence.res_content: What is formally correct may be materially false.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: What is formally correct may be materially false.

auth_sentence.content: Will this trend of materially useless discovery also continue forever?
auth_sentence.res_content: Will this trend of materially useless discovery also continue forever?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Will this trend of materially useless discovery also continue forever?

sentences.en: It is materially ahead of other countries.
sentences.cn: 在物质上,它比其他国家优越。
